alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ascension, west central Livingston and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shenandoah, or near Oak Hills Place. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Oak Hills Place, Old Jefferson, Village St. George, Inniswold, Shenandoah, Gardere and Westminster. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 162 and 168. Interstate 12 between mile markers 5 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Northern Livingston; Western Ascension
